import React, { useState } from 'react' import reviews from "./data" import { FaYoutube, FaChevronRight, FaChevronLeft } from 'react-icons/fa' const Review = () => { const[index, setIndex] = useState(0) const{name, job, text, image} = reviews[index] return (

{name}

{job}

{text}

bu
) } export default Review
